command:
Actions: DriveOnHeading

The robot will move forward 2 meters at 0.2 m/s speed using the DriveOnHeading action with positive distance (dist_to_travel="2.0").
xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="MoveForward">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MoveForward">
    <DriveOnHeading dist_to_travel="2.0" speed="0.2" time_allowance="30"/>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

command:
Actions: BackUp

The robot will move backward 1 meter at 0.1 m/s speed using the BackUp action with positive distance (backup_dist="1.0").
xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="MoveBackward">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MoveBackward">
    <BackUp backup_dist="1.0" backup_speed="0.1" time_allowance="30"/>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

command:
Actions: Spin

The robot will rotate clockwise (right) by executing a Spin action with negative distance (spin_dist="-1.57" radians), which corresponds to a 90-degree right turn.
xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="RotateRight">
  <BehaviorTree ID="RotateRight">
    <Spin spin_dist="-1.57" time_allowance="30"/>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

command:
Actions: Spin

The robot will rotate counterclockwise (left) by executing a Spin action with positive distance (spin_dist="1.57" radians), which corresponds to a 90-degree left turn.
xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="RotateLeft">
  <BehaviorTree ID="RotateLeft">
    <Spin spin_dist="1.57" time_allowance="30"/>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

command:
Actions: DetectObject, ComputePathToPose, FollowPath, PickObject

The robot will pick up the red cup by first detecting it, navigating to its position, and executing the pick action.
xml:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root BTCPP_format="4" main_tree_to_execute="PickRedCup">
  <BehaviorTree ID="PickRedCup">
    <Sequence name="PickSequence">
      <DetectObject object_description="red cup" target_pose="{cup_pose}"/>
      <ComputePathToPose goal="{cup_pose}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
      <PickObject target_pose="{cup_pose}"/>
    </Sequence>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>
